CatDescriptText: Sign inscribed "poverty hurts, Forget the euphemisms and statistics for a minute. Think about dirt and rats, crowded rooms and empty days. There is a way you can help change things. VISTA is a new volunteer organization like the Peace Corp. You'll work in the United States for a year, get living expenses and $60 a month, headaches, frustration, and, if you're successful, a lot of satisfaction. Interested! write VISTA, Washington, D.C. They'll be glad to tell you more."
TitMainTitle: Three men standing, including one in center holding sign that reads "Poverty Hurts", gathered on dirt beside sidewalk with debris along brick wall
